tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE knowledge_graphs (
  graph_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  graph_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeGraphEdges (
    edge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_node_id INT,
    to_node_id INT,
    edge_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (from_node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (to_node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeGraphProperties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id INT,
    property_key VARCHAR(50),
    property_value TEXT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Relationship (relationship_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
relationship_type VARCHAR NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE EntityRelationship (entity_id INTEGER,
relationship_id INTEGER,
PRIMARY KEY (entity_id, relationship_id),
FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES Entity(entity_id),
FOREIGN KEY (relationship_id) REFERENCES Relationship(relationship_id));

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeGraph (graph_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
graph_name VARCHAR NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeGraphEdges (
  edge_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  edge_label TEXT NOT NULL,
  source_node_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  target_node_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (target_node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeGraphRelations (
  relation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  relation_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  source_node_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  target_node_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (target_node_id) REFERENCES KnowledgeGraphNodes(node_id)
);
